title: The Stolen Kingdom
description: A fantastic fantasy novel for all ages! Free with Kindle Unlimited!You'll ride with Taylor James and Robert of Roth as they attempt to defeat the evil Dark Duke. Along the way, you'll have to survive the dangers of Cheshire Woods, battle brutes and monsters, and overcome incredible odds. This unique book will make you laugh and keep you on the edge of your seat. You'll never have more fun reading. If you like stories such as "The Princess Bride," King Arthur, or Lord of the Rings, you'll thoroughly enjoy this engaging tale.Recommended reading 5th grade and up. Great for teens!One of the best books for middle school students and perfect for parents or kids looking for a middle grade fantasy adventure! Free with Kindle Unlimited!Praise for The Stolen "If you want action and adventure this book is for you. I was not sure if I would enjoy this book, but I could not stop reading until I was finished. This book is for every age. High Fives to the author and this book.""Has a little of everything. Humor, suspense, romance and drama. Enjoyable for youth 10 years or older and adults alike.""This was one of my favorite amazon books yet. From beginning to end it was entertaining and easy to follow.""A terrific book for kids & adults. If you're a Harry Potter fan, you will love The Stolen Kingdom." "Best book ever...I wish I could give this book 10 stars! I loved all of the story I feel like this book can be a movie it has so much action."
author: Ross Rosenfeld
